pages.text: Wohi log qabool kertay hain jo suntay hain. Murdon ko Allah zinda ker kay uthaye ga phir sab Allah hi ki taraf laye jayen gay

Aur yeh log kehtay hain kay inn per koi moajza kiyon nahi nazil kiya gaya inn kay rab ki taraf say aap farma dijiye kay Allah Taalaa ko bey shak poori qudrat hai iss per kay woh moajza nazil farma dey lekin inn mein aksar bey khabar hain

Aur jitney qisam kay jaandaar zamin per chalney walay hain aur jitney qisam kay parind janwar hain kay apnay dono baazooâ€™on per urtay hain inn mein koi qisam aisi nahi kay jo kay tumhari tarah kay giroh na hon hum ney daftar mein koi cheez nahi chori phir sab apney perwerdigar kay pass jama kiye jayen gay
Aur jo log humari aayaton ki takzeeb kertay hain woh to tarah tarah ki zulmaton mein behray goongay ho rahey hain Allah jiss ko chahaye bey raah ker dey aur woh jiss ko chahaye seedhi raah laga dey
Aap kahiye kay apney haal to batlao kay agar tum per Allah ka koi azab aa paray ya tum per qayamat hi aa phonchay to kiya Allah kay siwa kissi aur ko pukaro gay. Agar tum sachay ho
Bulkay khaas ussi ko pukaro gay phir jiss kay liye tum pukaro gay agar woh chahaye to uss ko hata bhi dey aur jin ko tum shareek thehratay ho unn sab ko bhool bhaal jao gay
Aur hum ney aur ummaton ki taraf bhi jo kay aap say pehlay guzar chuki hain payghumbar bhejay thay so hum ney unn ko tangdasti aur beemari say pakra takay woh izhar-e-ijz ker saken
So jab unn ko humari saza phonchi thi to unhon ney aajzi kiyon nahi ikhtiyar ki? Lekin unn kay quloob sakht hogaye aur shetan ney unn kay aemaal ko unn kay khayal mein aaraasta ker diya

Phir jab woh log unn cheezon ko bhoolay rahey jin ki unn ko naseehat ki jati thi to hum ney unn per her cheez kay darwazay kushada ker diye yahan tak kay jab unn cheezon per jo kay unn ko mili thin woh khoob itra gaye hum ney unn ko dafatan pakar liya phir to woh bilkul mayyus hogaye
